verses.name: Numbers 26:59
verses.text: And the name of Amram’s wife was Jochebed, the daughter of Levi, whom her mother bare to Levi in Egypt: and she bare unto Amram Aaron and Moses, and Miriam their sister.

verses.name: Numbers 26:60
verses.text: And unto Aaron was born Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.

verses.name: Numbers 26:61
verses.text: And Nadab and Abihu died, when they offered strange fire before the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 26:62
verses.text: And those that were numbered of them were twenty and three thousand, all males from a month old and upward: for they were not numbered among the children of Israel, because there was no inheritance given them among the children of Israel.
